meanings.sent1: The kitten gave a gentle nip to my finger while playing.

meanings.sent4: The cold wind felt like a sharp nip on my cheeks.
meanings.sent5: The mosquito's nip left an itchy bump on my skin.

meanings.sent1: The puppy likes to nip at my shoelaces during walks.

meanings.definition: To cut off the tip of something
meanings.sent1: She had to nip the flower stems to fit them in the vase.
meanings.sent2: The tailor had to nip the fabric to make it fit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally nipped the corner of the paper while cutting.
meanings.sent4: The chef had to nip the excess dough to make the perfect shape.
meanings.sent5: The gardener needed to nip the bushes to keep them neat.
